text:
@realDonaldTrump I work on vaccine development and testing for #COVID19, bro. There is no way in hell we're getting a vaccine by the end of the year, even assuming a vaccine will work (never been able to get one for a #coronavirus before).

#TrumpLiesAmericansDie
